message: When the gate opens, we are greeted by cheerful music and the sound of firecrackers.

name: 紅雀
message: "What the...?"

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Welcome to Platinum Jail, Japan's biggest amusement park, the place where love and dreams come true!"
A strange-looking panda―were they going for cute?―totters out to greet us.
I see five white doors behind it.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Only the chosen are allowed to enter paradise! Please, enjoy your stay!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Paradise?"

name: 紅雀
message: "That's not shady or anything."
Not at all bothered by our lack of enthusiasm, the panda cheerfully pushes a button on the wall.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Now where, oh where will you two be headed? Let's spin the wheel of fun!"

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Oh, yes! Flame Willow it is! Right this way, please!"
The panda goes to the leftmost door and starts to dance around.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Flame Willow is for passionate folks with a love for thrills! Oh, your hearts are gonna pound!"

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Now let the fun begin!"

name: 紅雀
message: "Man, what is with that panda? I don't get it."

name: 紅雀
message: "We better stay on our toes."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."
This is almost certainly a trap, but we've come too far to turn back now.

name: 案内パンダ
message: "Please place your ticket or invitation on the authentication screen next to the door!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Invitation? You mean this thing?"
I open the invitation on my Coil and approach the screen.

name: 認証モニター
message: "Platinum ID confirmed. Welcome to Platinum Jail, Mr. Seragaki and companion. Admission procedures initiated."

name: 認証モニター
message: "Issuing guest ID to your companion. Please present your companion's Coil."
Koujaku touches his Coil to the screen.

name: 認証モニター
message: "Confirmed. Guest ID linked. All privileges belong to the Platinum Jail ID."

name: 認証モニター
message: "Please exercise caution, as the guest ID has more restricted privileges in some respects."

name: 認証モニター
message: "For additional details, please refer to the support section of your invitation card. Enjoy your time in the park."
